overview: The Oasis Laudromat has been there for 30 years, passed on from generation to generation. One day, the family's ailing mother passes away after saying the word "laundry." Believing there is some special fortune in the laundromat, the Ahn Family turns the it upside down. The laundromat turns into a mess overnight because of human greed...but was there really a fortune for them to find?
title: Oasis Laundromat
